# IZAKAYA-CLASS RESTAURANT SHUTTLE
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Medium
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 4-8
[color=#a4885c]Power Gen Type:[/color] Uranium
"A medium-size, japanese-inspired restaurant/pub ship with a large dining area, and equally large kitchen."
"This restaurant shuttle seats up to 34 customers in the dining area, providing the shuttle the capability to seat people all over the sector at once."
"The kitchen has a main cooking area can be used by up to 2 chefs comfortably, a separate beverages area to be used by a bartender, a food storage to store ingredients, and a freezer to butcher meats and store ingredients long-term."
"The in-house botany has 10 hydroponics tray and an animal pen, it is located near the kitchen for ease of logistics."
[italic]Brought to you by Settler's Spacecraft Firm.[/italic]
